text: The Boxer is a 1997 Irish British American drama movie directed by Jim Sheridan and starring Daniel Day-Lewis, Emily Watson, Ken Stott, Brian Cox, Gerard McSorley, Ian McElhinney. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1997 drama movies Category:1990s sports movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:1990s British drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Boxing movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Sheridan Category:Movies about the Irish Republican Army
title: The Boxer (1997 movie)
